Articles.Content:
Here is my latest creation, the "Missile To Air Truck 2" or "MTAT 2" for short.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Specifications:

  • Top speed: 22.2Ms (79.92Km/h, 49.65Mph)
  • Weight: 60.331 Ton (About the weight of an Abrams tank)
  • Length:9.5m
  • Width:4m
  • Height:2m
  • Armament: 6 Medium Missiles (Range 0f 25km, 15.5miles)
  • Communication: Radar, Communertron 32 and 64

Your not going to be winning any land speed records, however you will be devastating anything in a range of the missiles. It doesn't have a good turning circle or stop time, what 60 ton, 10m vehicle does.

Mods Used:

  • B9
  • Infernal Robotics
  • Lack Luster Labs
  • KAS
  • Romfarer's Laser System and Guided Weapons
  • Sceppies Minipack
  • Aviation Lights

I would like to give thanks to KSPer, neamerjell. If I didn't see his Mobile Crane post I wouldn't have gotten the idea to do this.

Craft File

If the Last Craft File didn't work download again, I have updated it.

Edited May 11, 2014 by -KidWithEyeBalls-

This is really a really nice vehicle you have here.

Definitely will try.

Look nice and is incredibly functional! I love it, the ones i used to build always lacked a protective layer for the missiles, or any protection, really. You managed to link both very well. The design is nice as well!
Thanks guys, I hope you have fun with it.
